passage_text: City of College Station, TX College Station is located in Brazos County in Texas. The median income is $31,596 and the median home value is $175,700. The population is 67% White, 6% Black, 9% Asian and 0% Native American or Native Hawaiian. 4% identify as another race or ethnicity, or two or more races.

The median home value in College Station is $187,500. College Station home values have gone up 7.6% over the past year and Zillow predicts they will rise 4.5% within the next year. The median rent price in College Station is $1,495, which is higher than the College Station Metro median of $1,400. Read more. Mortgage delinquency is the first step in the foreclosure process.
